title: Cant level up in boards
body: Is this normal?  My account level is 30 yet I can't do anything in the boards.

replies.body: As Rineyy mentioned, your profile needs to sync with the boards especially if it's posting for the first time.  It looks like posting here has updated everything, so all should be well now!  Let me know if you still have any problems posting!

Your Boards profile doesn't sync until you post or upvote / downvote a post. You're all synced now so have a Splash posting!!

(Credits to Porocles for enlightening my on the upvote / downvote) 

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-m7alwxVDQQ4/VXsRUvD21VI/AAAAAAAArXs/xz9GF6oweYY/s1600/pool_party_201_splash_1920.jpg
Looks like this is a problem that can be fixed by making a post. (Replying to try and fix my issue)
